00019 /*
00020     mfcc.cpp - Class source file for computing MFCC coefficients
00021     Beginning Date : June 6, 2006
00022     Completion Date : June 9, 2006
00023     Latest Modification : June 21, 2006

00029 // standard header files
00030 #include <math.h>
00031 #include <stdlib.h>
00032 #include <stdio.h>

00034 // project header files
00035 #include "mfcc.h"
00036 
00050 long MFCC :: MFCCcompute (short * inputSignal, long sampleRate, long numInputSamples, double **mfccVector, char * mfccfilename, long timeFrame) {
00051     long sampleIndex, i, j,  defaultTimeFrame, downSampleFactor, numFeatureVectors, n;
00052     FILE *fp, *mfccfp;
00053     real *tempMFCCdata;
00054     short * data;
00055     real * MFCCdata;
00056     Window win1;
00057 
00058     // open mfcc temp file for writing
00059         if(!(fp = fopen (_MFCCTEMPFILE, "wb")))                                 // if can't open then exit
00060         {
00061                 printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _MFCCTEMPFILE);         // print error message
00062                 exit (0);
00063         }
00064 
00065     samplingRate_ = sampleRate;
00066     defaultTimeFrame = (WINDOWSIZE * 1000L) / sampleRate;
00067     downSampleFactor = (long) ceil ((float) timeFrame / (float) defaultTimeFrame);
00068     numFeatureVectors = numInputSamples / downSampleFactor;
00069 
00070     // allocate memory for wave data
00071     data = (short *) calloc (WINDOWSIZE, sizeof (short));
00072     // allocate MFCC data
00073     mfccVector = (double **) calloc (numFeatureVectors, sizeof (double *));
00074     for (i = 0;  i < numFeatureVectors; i ++)
00075         mfccVector [i] = (double *) calloc (cepstralCoefs_, sizeof (double));
00076 
00077     // call MFCCupdate to initialize parameters for MFCC computation
00078     MFCCupdate ();
00079     // allocate memory for MFCC data array
00080     MFCCdata = (real *) calloc (cepstralCoefs_, sizeof (real));
00081     // temporary MFCC data array
00082     tempMFCCdata = (real *) calloc (cepstralCoefs_, sizeof (real));
00083     // intialize Hamming window coefficients
00084     win1.windowHammingUpdateTable (WINDOWSIZE);
00085     // compute MFCCs of overlaping blocks
00086     for (sampleIndex = 0; sampleIndex < numInputSamples; sampleIndex += (WINDOWSIZE - WINDOWOVERLAP))
00087     {
00088         if (sampleIndex + WINDOWSIZE < numInputSamples)
00089         {
00090             // load wave data into data array
00091             for (i = 0; i < WINDOWSIZE; i ++)
00092                 data [i] = inputSignal [sampleIndex + i];
00093             // perform hamming window
00094             win1.windowHamming (data, WINDOWSIZE, 0, data);
00095             // compute MFCC coefficients for the data block
00096             MFCCprocess (data, MFCCdata);
00097             // write MFCC coefficients into temporary file
00098             fwrite (MFCCdata, sizeof (real), cepstralCoefs_, fp);
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102     fclose (fp);
00103 
00104     // open mfcc temp file for reading
00105         if(!(fp = fopen (_MFCCTEMPFILE, "rb")))                                 // if can't open then exit
00106         {
00107                 printf ("Can't open file %s\n", _MFCCTEMPFILE);         // print error message
00108                 exit (0);
00109         }
00110 
00111     if (mfccfilename != NULL)
00112     {
00113         // open .mfcc file for writing
00114             if(!(mfccfp = fopen (mfccfilename, "wb")))                                  // if can't open then exit
00115         {
00116             printf ("Can't open file %s\n", mfccfilename);              // print error message
00117             exit (0);
00118             }
00119     }
00120 
00121     n = 0;
00122 
00123     // downsample MFCC coefficients to produce one vector for each timeFrame duration
00124     while (!feof (fp))
00125     {
00126         for (j = 0; j < cepstralCoefs_; j ++)
00127             tempMFCCdata [j] = 0.0;
00128 
00129         for (i = 0; i < downSampleFactor; i ++)
00130         {
00131             if (fread (MFCCdata, sizeof (real), cepstralCoefs_, fp) != cepstralCoefs_)
00132                 break;
00133             for (j = 0; j < cepstralCoefs_; j ++)
00134                 tempMFCCdata [j] += MFCCdata [j];
00135         }
00136 
00137         for (j = 0; j < cepstralCoefs_; j ++)
00138             mfccVector [n][j]= tempMFCCdata [j];
00139 
00140         n ++;
00141 
00142         // write final MFCC data into file
00143         if (mfccfilename != NULL)
00144             fwrite (tempMFCCdata, sizeof (real), cepstralCoefs_, mfccfp);
00145     }
00146 
00147     fclose (fp);
00148 
00149     if (mfccfilename != NULL)
00150         fclose (mfccfp);
00151 
00152     free (data);
00153     free (mfccVector);
00154     free (MFCCdata);
00155     free (tempMFCCdata);
00156     free (freqs_);
00157     free (lower_);
00158     free (center_);
00159     free (upper_);
00160     free (triangle_heights_);
00161     free (fftFreqs_);
00162     free (mfccFilterWeights_);
00163     free (mfccDCT_);
00164     free (fmagnitude_);
00165     free (earMagnitude_);
00166     free (inSignalBuffer);
00167 
00168     return (numFeatureVectors);
00169 } // end of MFCCcompute
00170 
00174 void MFCC :: MFCCupdate()
00175 {
00176     
00177     natural i,j;
00178     fftSize_ = WINDOWSIZE;
00179     inSize = WINDOWSIZE / 2;
00180     cepstralCoefs_ = _CEPSTRALCOEFS;
00181 
00182     // Initialize frequency boundaries for filters
00183     freqs_ = (real *) calloc (42, sizeof (real));
00184     lowestFrequency_ = 133.3333f;
00185     linearFilters_ = 13;
00186     linearSpacing_ = 66.66666f;
00187     logFilters_ = 27;
00188     logSpacing_ = 1.0711703f;
00189     totalFilters_ = linearFilters_ + logFilters_;
00190     lower_ = (real *) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real));
00191     center_ = (real *) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real));
00192     upper_ = (real *) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real));
00193     triangle_heights_ = (real *) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real));
00194 
00195     // Linear filter boundaries
00196     for (i=0; i< linearFilters_; i++)
00197            freqs_[i] = lowestFrequency_ + i * linearSpacing_;
00198 
00199     // Logarithmic filter boundaries
00200     real first_log = freqs_[linearFilters_-1];
00201     for (i=1; i<=logFilters_+2; i++)
00202        freqs_[linearFilters_-1+i] = first_log * pow(logSpacing_, (real)i);
00203 
00204     // Triangles information
00205     for (i=0; i<totalFilters_; i++)
00206            lower_[i] = freqs_[i];
00207     for (i=1; i<= totalFilters_; i++)
00208            center_[i-1] = freqs_[i];
00209     for (i=2; i<= totalFilters_+1; i++)
00210            upper_[i-2] = freqs_[i];
00211     for (i=0; i<totalFilters_; i++)
00212            triangle_heights_[i] = (real)(2.0 / (upper_[i] - lower_[i]));
00213       
00214     // allocate memory for fft signal
00215     fftFreqs_ = (real *) calloc (fftSize_, sizeof (real));
00216     cepstralCoefs_ = 13;
00217 
00218     for (i=0; i< fftSize_; i++)
00219     {
00220            fftFreqs_[i] = (real)i / (real)fftSize_ * (real)samplingRate_;
00221     }
00222 
00223     // allocate memory for mfcc filter basis function
00224     mfccFilterWeights_ = (real **) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real *));
00225     for (i = 0; i < totalFilters_; i++)
00226         mfccFilterWeights_[i] = (real *) calloc (fftSize_, sizeof (real));
00227 
00228     // allocate memory for DCT basis function
00229     mfccDCT_ = (real **) calloc (cepstralCoefs_, sizeof (real *));
00230     for (i = 0; i < cepstralCoefs_; i++)
00231         mfccDCT_[i] = (real *) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real));
00232 
00233     natural chan;
00234       
00235     // Initialize mfcc filter coefficients
00236     for (chan = 0; chan < totalFilters_; chan++)
00237         {
00238         for (i=0; i< fftSize_; i++)
00239             {
00240                if ((fftFreqs_[i] > lower_[chan])&& (fftFreqs_[i] <= center_[chan]))
00241                {
00242                       mfccFilterWeights_[chan][i] = triangle_heights_[chan] * ((fftFreqs_[i] - lower_[chan])/(center_[chan] - lower_[chan]));
00243            }
00244                if ((fftFreqs_[i] > center_[chan]) && (fftFreqs_[i] <= upper_[chan]))
00245                {
00246                       mfccFilterWeights_[chan][i] = triangle_heights_[chan] * ((upper_[chan] - fftFreqs_[i])/(upper_[chan] - center_[chan]));
00247                }
00248            }
00249     }
00250 
00251     // Initialize DCT coefficients
00252     real scale_fac = (real)(1.0/ sqrt((real)(totalFilters_/2)));
00253     for (j = 0; j<cepstralCoefs_; j++)
00254         {
00255         for (i=0; i< totalFilters_; i++)
00256         {
00257                mfccDCT_[j][i] = scale_fac * cos(j * (2*i +1) * PI/2/totalFilters_);
00258                if (i == 0)
00259                    mfccDCT_[j][i] *= (real)(sqrt(2.0)/2.0);
00260         }
00261     }
00262   
00263     pfftSize_ = fftSize_;
00264     psamplingRate_ = samplingRate_;
00265   
00266     // allocate memory for fft signal and mfcc coefficients
00267     fmagnitude_ = (real *) calloc (inSize * 2, sizeof (real));
00268     earMagnitude_ = (real *) calloc (totalFilters_, sizeof (real));
00269     inSignalBuffer = (real *) calloc (inSize * 2, sizeof (real));
00270 }
00271 
00275 void MFCC :: MFCCprocess(short * inSignal, real * outSignal)
00276 {
00277     natural i,k;
00278     Fft f1;
00279     // copy input signal and perform fft
00280     for (i = 0; i < inSize * 2; i ++)
00281     {
00282         inSignalBuffer [i] = (real) inSignal [i];
00283     }
00284     f1.rfft (inSignalBuffer, inSize, 1);
00285 
00286     // take log of amplitude
00287     for (i = 0; i < inSize; i ++)
00288     {
00289         inSignalBuffer [i] = (sqrt (inSignalBuffer [2 * i] * inSignalBuffer [2 * i] + inSignalBuffer [2 * i + 1] * inSignalBuffer [2 * i + 1]));
00290     }
00291 
00292     // mirror the spectrum
00293     for (long o=0; o < inSize; o++)
00294     {
00295         fmagnitude_[o] = inSignalBuffer[o];
00296     }
00297     for (long o=0; o< inSize; o++)
00298     {
00299         fmagnitude_[o + inSize] = fmagnitude_[inSize - o];
00300     }
00301     real sum = 0.0;
00302 
00303     // Calculate the filterbank responce
00304     for (i=0; i<totalFilters_; i++)
00305     { 
00306         sum = 0.0;
00307         for (k=0; k<fftSize_; k++)
00308             {
00309                sum += (mfccFilterWeights_[i][k] * fmagnitude_[k]);
00310         }
00311         if (sum != 0.0)
00312                earMagnitude_[i] = log10(sum);
00313         else
00314                earMagnitude_[i] = 0.0;
00315     }
00316 
00317     // Take the DCT
00318     for (long o=0; o < cepstralCoefs_; o++)
00319     {
00320         sum =0.0;
00321         for (k=0; k < totalFilters_; k++)
00322             {
00323                sum += (mfccDCT_[o][k] * earMagnitude_[k]);
00324             }
00325         outSignal[o] = sum;
00326     }
00327 }
